name: RetroStar
description:
In 1901 ( Earth Time ) alien Selenites hives were discovered infesting Federation star systems.

Fortunately the Selenites were almost wiped out within the year by the common cold virus.

For centuries they have been intent on revenge for what they claim was a biological attack.

They have now launched a full invasion. Your mission is to destroy as many Selenite fighters as you can.

Selenites destroy our starbases by first surrounding them on four sides.

At that point the starbase is doomed, unless you get there first...

Included languages: English, French, Italian, Spanish, Swedish, Portuguese, Hungarian, Russian.

Touch controls:
Finger on lower left of screen to steer starfighter
Finger on lower right of screen to fire photon weapon
Back will bring up menu to select views, speed, and other options (Quit, etc.)

Joypad controls (if a joypad is connected to your device):
Left analog/DPad will steer starfighter
One of the fire buttons will fire photon weapon
Back will bring up menu to select views, speed, and other options (Quit, etc.)
Shoulder buttons (if available) will also change speed

Keyboard controls (if a keyboard is connected to your device):
Cursor UDLR will steer starfighter, unless icon menu is being displayed
Spacebar will fire photon weapon
0..9 Set power to starfighter engines
H Start Hyperwarp engines
G Galactic Map on or off
F Forward view
A Aft view
L Long range scan view
S Shields on or off
C Computer on or off
P Pause time & Space
Q Bring up icon menu to select surrender starfighter, etc...

Important: This is a classic retro style arcade space combat simulator - Selenites do not exist and you are not in command of a real starfighter!
